top_comment.text:
I was told my twin was dead. Hey is there a guy watching this wko is also a 
brony with a 98 Chevy and a 2005 S500 Bens?﻿
top_comment.author: Dixie Belle

comments.text:
+Dixie Belle Do you have a Black Labrador who is named Ebony? My adopted 
brother does!
comments.author: Dizzie Kid

comments.text: +Elsi Cifuentes are you as country as a turnip green?
comments.author: Dixie Belle

comments.text: Ps. Wko is now a word. Whack-kew meaning awesomeness.
comments.author: Dixie Belle

top_comment.text:
Hmm, I wonder if I have a long lost twin, once I remember my friend telling 
me that she met someone exactly like me....Hmm....﻿
top_comment.author: Alice the Mawile
